title: What do i do if random people keep asking me to boost them
body: every now and then, some people I had on my friends list from years ago ask me to boost them. I am wondering if there is a way to report them if I have screen shots or something, or should I just ignore them completely

Technically there is nothing wrong with the actual ASKING for a boost, the problem is in the acquisition of said boost.

You can submit a ticket through the [support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) section of the website. There's no option for "player behaviour" though I usually just put it under "I have questions about League" > "Game and Features" > "General Questions" and the support staff will forward it to the player behaviour team.
